global.title: Medtronic Adds Board Seats
global.summary: Medtronic appointed two new board members and formed committees focusing on AI and robotics innovation.

global.title: AI in Medtech Booms with FDA Approvals
global.summary: FDA cleared 1,200+ AI-powered devices in 2025, with radiology leading and cardiology/neurology ramping.

indian.title: India Boosts Medtech Manufacturing
indian.summary: PLI scheme propels manufacturing; India targets a $50B market by 2030 with startup-friendly reforms.

indian.title: Poly Medicure Expands Exports
indian.summary: Poly Medicure plans to expand capacity and exports across key markets.
